paper.title: Industry credit spread forecasting based on time series data and industry relationships
paper.abstract: Credit spread is an important index in the financial market, as it captures the risk for the bond issuer and industry. As there are several types of connections among different industries, through which the risk may propagate from one industry to another, it may be helpful to take these connections into account for bond spread forecasting. In this paper, we propose a novel industry bond spread forecasting method based on LSTM and the temporal graph neural networks, which exploits the relations among different industries. The experimental results demonstrate that introducing industry relations can improve the prediction accuracy of the prediction.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用LSTM和时间图神经网络预测行业信用利差，信用利差是衡量债券发行人及行业风险的重要指标，因此该研究主要应用于金融风险管理领域。
